Plot: Vincent, is an ex-soldier with PTSD who is hired to protect the wife and child of a wealthy Lebanese businessman while he's out of town. Despite the apparent tranquility in Maryland, Vincent perceives an external threat.
Title: Disorder
Writer: Alice Winocour, Jean-Stéphane Bron (in collaboration with), Robin Campillo (script consultant), Vincent Poymiro (script consultant)
Actors: Matthias Schoenaerts, Diane Kruger, Paul Hamy, Zaïd Errougui-Demonsant
